amendment.description: To provide funding for the AIDS Drug Assistance Program within the Health Resources and Services Administration.

action.text: Amendment SA 2259 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Smith.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2259.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2259 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 278.
Amendment SA 2259 ruled out of order by the chair.
